mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Stout, B. B. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Stout, B. B.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Hon F.H. Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Gov Va Wheeling May 9 1862. By Telegraph from Clarksburg 19 1862. Sir the militia of this county both armed & unarmed have been disbanded except one company is that your orders Capt BB[crossed out] Capt B.B. Stout 20D65pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Stout, B. B.
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
